messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] looking for the symbol's of the samurai?
messages.msgSnippet: Yes Kamon will be you best bet. I ask my host mother awhile back about the same thing and she showed me to a good website. But it was all in Japanese but the
messages.messageBody:
Yes Kamon will be you best bet. I ask my host mother awhile back about
the same thing and she showed me to a good website. But it was all in
Japanese but the pictures was very detailed. If I find it I will try
to email you.

One way to find it is go to yahoo.cm.jp I think and type kamon in
Japanese. Doing that will surely help too.

Quoting Michael Baker <maikeru_art@...>:

> I think there is more than 42 in all also. I mean how many clans
> could fit in a region?
>
> Nate Ledbetter <ltdomer98@...> wrote: Try looking up
> "kamon" in your prefferred search engine. You're thinking of kamon,
> which are family crests. Each samurai family had their own, much
> like a European knight had a coat of arms. There are major
> differences, but those with more knowledge than I can sort that out.
> Or, you can do some research, which is the preferred option.
>
> ----- Original Message ----
> From: tmfk16 <moto420xr@...>
> To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Saturday, March 29, 2008 10:36:49 AM
> Subject: [samuraihistory] looking for the symbol's of the samurai?
>
> I am trying to find the sign's of the Samurai. I think that there are
> 42 sign's in all. These are drawing's, that represent the symbol's of
> the Samurai. Some look like mushroom cap's, with other line's drawn
> around them. Sort of like the modern Day bio hazard symbol. Can anyone
> direct Me to a link, where I can find these? Thanks. Tom.
>
> __________________________________________________________

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] looking for the symbol's of the samurai?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I m a designer and one day I found this website with lots of kamons. I don t know how accurate they are but there is a lot in there and they are all hi-res
messages.messageBody:
Hi!
I'm a designer and one day I found this website with lots of kamons. I don't
know how accurate they are but there is a lot in there and they are all
hi-res if you need to download.
Hope it helps: http://eps.crest-japan.net/index_en.php

Regards!
Yurii Hayashi
Â» www.yuri.com.br


----- Original Message -----
From: tmfk16
Subject: [samuraihistory] looking for the symbol's of the samurai?

I am trying to find the sign's of the Samurai. I think that there are
42 sign's in all. These are drawing's, that represent the symbol's of
the Samurai. Some look like mushroom cap's, with other line's drawn
around them. Sort of like the modern Day bio hazard symbol. Can anyone
direct Me to a link, where I can find these? Thanks. Tom.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] looking for the symbol's of the samurai?
messages.msgSnippet: I think there is more than 42 in all also. I mean how many clans could fit in a region? Nate Ledbetter  wrote:          Try looking up
messages.messageBody:
I think there is more than 42 in all also. I mean how many clans could fit in a region?

Nate Ledbetter <ltdomer98@...> wrote: Try looking up "kamon" in your prefferred search engine. You're thinking of kamon, which are family crests. Each samurai family had their own, much like a European knight had a coat of arms. There are major differences, but those with more knowledge than I can sort that out. Or, you can do some research, which is the preferred option.

----- Original Message ----
From: tmfk16 <moto420xr@...>
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, March 29, 2008 10:36:49 AM
Subject: [samuraihistory] looking for the symbol's of the samurai?

I am trying to find the sign's of the Samurai. I think that there are
42 sign's in all. These are drawing's, that represent the symbol's of
the Samurai. Some look like mushroom cap's, with other line's drawn
around them. Sort of like the modern Day bio hazard symbol. Can anyone
direct Me to a link, where I can find these? Thanks. Tom.

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] looking for the symbol's of the samurai?
messages.msgSnippet: Try looking up kamon in your prefferred search engine. You re thinking of kamon, which are family crests. Each samurai family had their own, much like a
messages.messageBody:
Try looking up "kamon" in your prefferred search engine. You're thinking of kamon, which are family crests. Each samurai family had their own, much like a European knight had a coat of arms. There are major differences, but those with more knowledge than I can sort that out. Or, you can do some research, which is the preferred option.



----- Original Message ----
From: tmfk16 <moto420xr@...>

I am trying to find the sign's of the Samurai. I think that there are
42 sign's in all. These are drawing's, that represent the symbol's of
the Samurai. Some look like mushroom cap's, with other line's drawn
around them. Sort of like the modern Day bio hazard symbol. Can anyone
direct Me to a link, where I can find these? Thanks. Tom.
